markdownRemark.html:
Come live at Heart House

üè° Heart House in Grass Valley is looking for a new member to join our household, with a flexible move in date starting in July.

About us

Our community moved in together in the Summer of 2018 and purchased our beautiful home in Grass Valley in 2021. Our beloved Heath is transitioning out, moving in with his partner, and we are seeking an individual or couple to join.

We are a two couples and Chuck (four adults plus one cat!) in our mid 30s to early 40s and are a heart-centered/mindful group of creatives, engineers, healers, and dancers. We love eating/hanging together in the kitchen, cozying up for movie nights, working out together, and having little house getaways just as much as we enjoy rejuvenating, low-key, introvert time. We all have our own lives and schedules, but also prioritize our house community.

Some of Our Community Values
  • Welcoming differing beliefs, ideas, and backgrounds.
  • Minimizing our footprint on planet Earth, exploring ways and choosing options whenever possible that reduce our impact and promote health of our bodies and our land. This may look like abstaining from chemicals and toxins, buying bulk, being mindful of energy use, etc.
  • Caring for and stewarding the land that we live on.
  • Queer members and LGBTQIA+ and all lineages stoked.
  • Creativity! We welcome outside the box thinking and multi-faceted means of self-expression.
  • Participation in house cleanliness and organization.
  • Open and direct communication, healthy boundary setting, willingness to engage and meet each other if disagreements arise.
  • Willingness to share our hearts and be comfortable with emotional vulnerability.
  • Body and sex positivity / Nudity welcome.
  • Attunement to each other and context in shared living spaces

‚ú® Details

üõèÔ∏è $1200 for a single tenant, $1600 for couples, out of a total of $5500 rent per month.

üè† 11 x 11 room with built-in wardobe and lot of sunlight

üçΩÔ∏è $180 monthly shared food budget.

üí° Split bills: propane, internet, electricity, landscaping, garbage, streaming services, and house cleaner every 4-6 weeks.

üêï No pets

üè° Guest room available for friends and family visits.

üèä‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Enjoy the large hot tub and gorgeous pool equipped with waterfalls and natural rock appearance modeled after the Yuba River.

üå≥ Tranquil, private, and quiet environment nested among the trees.

üåø Embrace the beauty of five acres of nature, including a pond, majestic pines and oaks, a lovely meadow, fruit orchard, and a variety of wildlife like deer, song-birds, turkey, frogs, and lizards.

‚õ∞Ô∏è You are ready for the adventures of mountain life and rural living

üåê High-speed fiber internet.

üèïÔ∏è 28‚Äô yurt on the land hosting semi-regular ceremonies, potentially open for shared use.

üóÑÔ∏è Ample storage space.

üöΩ Primary access to one shared bathroom.

‚åõ Flexible lease duration.

üöó 15 minutes from Grass Valley, Nevada City and Colfax. An hour to Sacramento and two and a half hours to the Bay Area. An hour to ski resorts, 30 minutes to the Yuba river

This isn‚Äôt for you if:

  • You have a dog, cat or bird
  • You are looking for a room, with no interaction or relationship to others living on the land.
  • You don‚Äôt like or are allergic to cats
  • You party-super hard and want to have regular raging social events and noise after quiet night hours
  • Conversely, you aren‚Äôt happy to have semi-regular guests staying at the property, local friends coming over and using the pool, and the occasional (2-4 a year) later-night party.

This is for you if:

  • You love swimming everyday
  • You value the gorgeous vistas and four distinct seasons
  • You love hiking, river visits, snow sports and/or mountain biking
  • You want to be close to all sorts of nature
  • You are curious about trying out the Grass Valley/Nevada City area, which has a small population but strong movement, music and regenerative culture communities
  • You want all of that but with a fiber internet connection

Whether you‚Äôre looking for a medium-term or long-term stay, our lease duration is somewhat flexible.

Reach out to h3arthouse@gmail.com for questions and fill out this form. If there is an initial resonance, we‚Äôll schedule a time to video call, viewings and an in-person meeting.
